## Legend and Styling Guide

| Component Type | Color | Description |
|----------------|-------|-------------|
| Existing | Green (`#9f9`) | Operational components with existing implementations |
| Recommended | Blue (`#9cf`) | Components recommended for implementation |
| Hypothetical | Yellow (`#ff9`) | Hypothetical components requiring investigation |
| External | Gray (`#ccc`) | External systems outside architecture boundary |

### Interface Notation
- Solid arrows: Direct dependencies
- Dashed arrows: Indirect dependencies
- Edge labels: Interface names or protocols
